name: Commissariat à l'Energie atomique et aux énergies alternatives
memberOrga: CLORA, EARTO, FORATOM, ENEF, CONFRONTATIONS EUROPE, EFS, ATHENORA/CRE
goal:
CEA is a public research organization devoted to three broad areas: low-carbon energy, health and information technologies, defence and global security. In its mission, are listed as well:
- Developing international and European collaborations
- Training young researchers through PhD and courses
- Developing an efficient intellectual property policy
- Contributing to knowledge transfer towards industry
interests: Budget, Education, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Nuclear Safety Directive, 2030 Energy Framework, Energy Union, Digital single market, State Aids...
